Posts.Content: Does anyone know what the next step of treatment is after a Leep Procedure?
Posts.Title: Next Step

Posts.Content: I had my LEEP done last Friday, not a very good experience but I'm sure glad it's over with. Now it's another waiting game to see whether or not they found anything. Hopefully it's all clear. Thanks for the reply, good luck to you.
Posts.Title: Next Step
